Randomization regard type psychological support . Either accord Acceptance Commitment Therapy traditional cognitive behavioral therapy . Both kind psychological support give group therapy . DOC.brief_title: Moderate Extensive Carbohydrate Reduction Risk Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The organizer recruit 200 patient study `` To lower glucose level reduce weight exclusion carbohydrates inclusion psychological behavioral support '' ( LOWinCHIP ) primary care health center `` Cithyhälsan Centrum '' Norrköping . Each patient follow 2 year . Patients eligible 18 year age BMI 28 kg/m2 also belong one follow group : 1 ) type 2 diabetes treat insulin . 2 ) Patients gestational diabetes 3 ) first grade relative type 2 diabetes . Finally 4 ) pre-diabetic individual impair fast glucose ( 6.1-6.9 mmol ) impair glucose tolerance ( capillary plasma glucose 8.9-12-1 glucose challenge ) also potential participant . Patients must insulin therapy severe kidney failure ( GFR < 30 ) . They also severe physical restriction activity must difficulties understand write Swedish text . The participant randomize two time ( two two factorial ) : Randomization regard carbohydrate restriction ( 25-30 E % < 10E % ) . Randomization regard type psychological support . Either accord Acceptance Commitment Therapy ( ACT ) traditional cognitive behavioral therapy . Each group three group session approximately 8 participant follow telephone call therapist . Each session hold psychologist part Cityhälsan Centrum staff . The study > 95 % power demonstrate 5 % HbA1c ( mmol/mol ) difference group drop 25 % .
DOC.criteria: Diabetes without insulin . Patients high risk develop diabetes . Severe kidney failure . Insulin therapy . Inability understand instruction .
